property.name: browser.fullName
property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Unknown; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/538.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) PhantomJS/2.0.0 Safari/538.1

testcase.name: should return the server storage from the http backend for single key
should return the server storage in a single request for multiple keys
should only fetch remote data on the first access for a user / key
should only fetch remote data for non-cached keys
should sync local storage changes to the backend per key
should should clear the storage when the user changes.
should reliably read and write objects into local storage
should answer requests from localstorage if there is no network connection
should queue changes when offline for remote sync
